summary: Action required: Fix workload deployed in a restricted project
description: Your cluster requires you to take action. The workload '${CUSTOMER_WORKLOAD}' has been deployed in the '${RESTRICTED_PROJECT}' project  which is a reserved project for cluster's infrastructure components. Other components are unlikely to function properly in this reserved project and should be installed to a different one. To learn more about restricted projects, refer to the documentation: https://docs.redhat.com/en/documentation/red_hat_openshift_service_on_aws_classic_architecture/4/html/support/troubleshooting#sd-managed-resources.
